ExampleDefinition.Title: Create a StockChart
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows how to create multi-pane stock charts using the SciStockChart control
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Create a Stock Chart</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Simple example which shows how to create a stock chart using the SciStockChart control. This control allows easy creation of stock charts and also has default interaction applied, including Zooming, Panning, Mousewheel zoom and Cursors.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Interactivity Options</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Pan by selecting Pan and dragging the chart.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Zoom by selecting zoom and zooming the chart.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag XAxis or YAxis to scale.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Mousewheel zoom.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Double click to reset zoom.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Hover to show the X-Y Cursor.</Run>
